title: Physics
content: What exactly do I need to refer other than Faisal sir slides?both for theory and numericals?

comments.body: I just listened in class and pretty much only referred to Faisal sirs slides (didnâ€™t practice a single question other than that since he has questions in his slides) and got an A grade

just read notes 3-4 times..listen to class fs numericals from last pgs r enough...faisal sir slides help a lot for unit 2 especially. But stick to notes for unit 1,3,4, got an S doing the same

yes u have to see them 2-3 times
